thread.title: Baahubali 2’s Prabhas and SS Rajamouli are all smiles as the team wraps up the shoot – view HQ pics!
thread.title_full: Baahubali 2’s Prabhas and SS Rajamouli are all smiles as the team wraps up the shoot – view HQ pics!

author: Urmimala Banerjee
title: Baahubali 2’s Prabhas and SS Rajamouli are all smiles as the team wraps up the shoot – view HQ pics!
text:
Prabhas Parties & Events Photos 
Emotions are running high for Baahubali fans. Actor Prabhas finished his work on the project after devoting 613 days of his life to the magnum opus. He finished his part for Baahubali 2 and filmmaker SS Rajamouli thanked him with an emotional tweet. Prabhas plays Mahendra Baahubali in the second film that holds the key to the No.1 question, why did Katappa kill Baahubali. The film stars Prabhas, Rana Daggubati , Anushka Shetty, Tamannaah Bhatia and Sathyaraj in main roles. Baahubali has set a yardstick for Indian cinema with its scale and amazing production values. It is produced by Shobu Yarlagadda and Prasad Devinini of ARKA Mediaworks. 
The first film was made on a budget of Rs 250 crore and grossed over Rs 600 crore till date. Baahubali also made Prabhas and Rana household names in North India. The second part will also have some enthralling fight sequences and visuals, which is a high point of the film. Baahubali is written by the father of SS Rajamouli, Vijayendra Prasad. Prabhas, looking quite big was in a happy mood on the last day of the shoot. The crew members took selfies with some of the props that have been so lovingly created by the team. (Also Read: Prabhas’ commitment for Baahubali is unparalleled, says Shobu Yarlagadda) 

Director of photography KK Senthil Kumar is also seen in many of the pictures. He also took to twitter to thank his core team and everyone who had worked hard day and night to make this dream project a reality. He also wrote about how Prabhas held a Gumadhkay to signify that the shoot was indeed over. Baahubali 2 will come to the theatres in April 2017 and we cannot contain our excitement. 
There was a lot of speculation that the teaser of Baahubali 2 will be attached to Shah Rukh Khan’s Raees. However, producer Shobu Yarlagadda confirmed that it is not true. This has made the fans’ wait even more longer. While Rana Daggubati had told us that shooting for Baahubali 2 was easier as the team was more experienced, we feel that was not the case. Just imagine the pressure on their heads after the success of part one .Stay tuned to Bollywood Life for more updates…
